description.en: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fourth Lunar Year. The fourth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rabbit.
description.ar: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fourth Lunar Year. The fourth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rabbit.
description.br: Uma capa lindamente trabalhada e adornada com um símbolo que representa o quarto Ano Lunar. O quarto Ano Lunar é dedicado ao Coelho.
description.cns: 一件做工精美的披风。披风的图案展示的是第四地支卯，该年的生肖为兔。
description.de: Trägt das Symbol zum Jahr des Hasen aus dem chinesischen Tierkreiszeichen. Erhöht die Intelligenz um vier.
description.fi: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fourth Lunar Year. The fourth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rabbit.
description.fil: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fourth Lunar Year. The fourth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rabbit.
description.fr: Une Cape magnifiquement conçue, ornée d'un symbole qui représente la quatrième Année Lunaire. La quatrième Année Lunaire est dédiée au Lapin.
description.id: Cloak yang dibuat dengan indah dihiasi dengan simbol yang mewakili Tahun Imlek keempat. Tahun Imlek keempat didedikasikan untuk the Rabbit.
description.it: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fourth Lunar Year. The fourth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rabbit.
description.jp: 4番目の月の年を表すシンボルで飾られた美しく細工されたマント。旧正月は兔に捧げられます。
description.kr: 음력 4 년을 상징하는 상징이 새겨진 아름답게 제작 된 망토입니다. 네 번째 음력은 토끼에게 바쳐집니다.
description.nl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fourth Lunar Year. The fourth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rabbit.
description.pl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fourth Lunar Year. The fourth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rabbit.
description.ru: Красивый плащ с символом четвертого года китайского календаря - кроликом.
description.sp: Una capa bellamente elaborada adornada con un símbolo que representa el cuarto Año Lunar. El cuarto Año Lunar está dedicado al Conejo.
description.sw: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fourth Lunar Year. The fourth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rabbit.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมที่ประดิษฐ์ขึ้นอย่างสวยงามประดับด้วยสัญลักษณ์ที่แสดงถึงปีจันทรคติที่สี่ ปีจันทรคติที่สี่อุทิศให้กับกระต่าย
description.tw: 象徵農曆生肖兔年的斗篷
description.vi: Một chiếc áo choàng được làm thủ công đẹp mắt được trang trí bằng một biểu tượng tượng trưng cho Mùng 4 Tết. Mùng 4 Tết dành riêng cho Quý Mão.
